STATE OF MICHIGAN
DEPARTMENT OF HEALTH AND HUMAN SERVICES
GRETCHEN WHITMER ROBERT GORDON
LANSING
GOVERNOR DIRECTOR
December 16, 2020
7th Probate and Family Court
301 State Street
Charlevoix, MI 49720
RE: License #: CA150201032
7th Probate and Family Court
301 State Street
Charlevoix, MI 49720
Dear Judge Snyder:
Attached is the Interim Inspection Report for the above referenced facility completed on
December 15, 2020. The inspection has determined substantial compliance with
applicable licensing statutes and rules.
Please review the enclosed documentation for accuracy and contact me with any
questions. In the event that I am not available, and you need to speak to someone
immediately, please contact the area manage, Claudia Triestram at (616) 552-3662.
Sincerely,
Stephanie Meeuwenberg, Licensing Consultant
MDHHS\Division of Child Welfare Licensing
Suite 200
121 Franklin Street SE
Grand Rapids, MI 49507
enclosure
P.O. BOX 30650  LANSING, MICHIGAN 48909
www.michigan.gov  (517) 335-1980

III. DESCRIPTION OF FINDINGS
The facility is in compliance with all applicable licensing statutes and rules.
IV. TECHNICAL ASSISTANCE
The facility did not require technical assistance during this period under review.
V. CONSULTATION
The facility did not request consultation during this period under review.
VI. EVALUATION OF RENEWAL PERIOD
There were no substantiated incidents of maltreatment in care during this licensing
period.
There were no incidents of substantiated corporal punishment during this licensing
period.
The current administration and personnel of 7th Probate Court continue to provide
quality service to their foster homes.
VII. RECOMMENDATION
Based on inspection findings the facility is in compliance with all applicable licensing
statutes and rules. It is recommended that the facility continue on a regular license.
_____________________________________December 16, 2020
Stephanie Meeuwenberg Date
